author: KPOB-TV

review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick in March 2015 through my Amazon Prime account.  It does not work properly and there is no way to return it for a credit or get any service as far as I can tell. The content does not sync.  I have tried every troubleshooting tip Amazon recommends.  None of them work.  It is very frustrating when the content does not sync.  The Fire Stick is also very temperamental.  The remote does not effectively navigate the screen and in many cases sticks.  When it finally unsticks, the curser races across the screen.  I would not recommend the device.  The ROKU is a much better product.
